sentence: (Photo By Tom Williams/CQ-Roll Call, Inc via Getty Images) Tom Williams | CQ-Roll Call, Inc. | Getty Images People who received the Pfizer and BioNTech Covid vaccine can now get a booster shot five months after their second dose, a month sooner than the federal government's previous guidance.
author: Spencer Kimball
title: CDC shortens waiting period for Pfizer Covid boosters to 5 months

sentence: Kidus Girma, a 26-year-old Sunrise Movement activist who helped organize protests against Manchin this past fall, calls him the final villain.? title: Manchin's Coal Corruption Is So Much Worse Than You Knew
